doc.title: Bekarlik sultanliktir
doc.plot: Nursen and Hasan are engaged. Hasan goes to a business trip to Ankara which makes Nursen angry so that she starts dating Selim to make him jealous. Hasan asks his friend Davut from the "Bachelors' Society" to follow them, he causes her to stay distant from Selim who is in love with Nursen. Nursen is a member of the "Matchmaking Society for Bachelors" and wants to take revenge from Hasan and Davut. Hasan starts dating another girl in Ankara, Nursen calls him and tells she is in love with Davut. Hasan comes and terminates their relationship. At this time, the "Matchmaking Society for Bachelors" gets into the house and tells that everything was a game, Nursen really loves Selim and in the end they get married, so do Hasan and his girl friend from Ankara and the presidents of both societies.
